SupportÂ¶

The easiest way to get help with the project is to join the #scikit-groups channel on Freenode. We hang out there and you can get real-time help with your projects. The other good way is to open an issue on Github.

The mailing list at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/scikit-groups is also available for support.
